sentences.en: "I shall go, leave him." Laura Stebbing stopped, her eyes glistening.
sentences.cn: “我要走，离开他。”劳拉·斯特宾停了下来，眼里闪烁着光芒。

sentences.en: "Shall I come to see you?" — "Are you kidding? It's miles."
sentences.cn: “我去看望你好吗？”——“你在开玩笑吗？路很远的。”

sentences.en: I have started planning out what I shall be doing next week.
sentences.cn: 我已开始详细安排下周要干的事儿了。

sentences.en: I know I shall feel for ever in her debt.
sentences.cn: 我知道我将会永远感激她。

sentences.en: I said you could go, and so you shall.
sentences.cn: 我说了你可以去，你就一定可以去。

sentences.en: I shall advertise for someone to go with me.
sentences.cn: 我将登广告寻人和我同去。

sentences.en: I shall be 26 years old on Friday next.
sentences.cn: 下周五我就26岁了.

sentences.en: I shall have to be careful.
sentences.cn: 我得当心。

sentences.en: I shall have words with these stupid friends of mine!
sentences.cn: 我真应该跟我这些愚蠢的朋友理论理论！

sentences.en: I’ve never liked her and I never shall.
sentences.cn: 我从来都不喜欢她，以后也不会。

sentences.en: It's not a very good line. Shall we call you back Susan?
sentences.cn: 电话线路不太好。苏珊，我待会儿再打给你好吗？

sentences.en: Let's have a nice little stroll, shall we?
sentences.cn: 咱们去好好散散步，好吗？

sentences.en: My involvement has not been altogether, shall we say, ethical.
sentences.cn: 可以说，我的参与还不是完全合乎道德。

sentences.en: Shall I get the keys?
sentences.cn: 我拿钥匙可以吗？

sentences.en: That is another matter altogether. And we shall come to that next.
sentences.cn: 那完全是另一回事，接下来我们会谈到。

sentences.en: The editor's decision is final and shall evermore remain so.
sentences.cn: 编辑的决定是最终性的，而且应该永远不会改变。

sentences.en: The truth shall make you free.
sentences.cn: 真理必令你们得自由。

sentences.en: We shall be away next week.
sentences.cn: 我们下周要出去。

sentences.en: We shall be landing in Paris in sixteen minutes, exactly on time.
sentences.cn: 我们将于16分钟后准时在巴黎降落。

sentences.en: We shall be skirting the island on our way.
sentences.cn: 我们将一路环岛而行。

sentences.en: We shall first look briefly at the historical antecedents of this theory.
sentences.cn: 我们首先应大致看一下该理论在历史上的前身。

sentences.en: We shall have finished by Friday.
sentences.cn: 星期五前我们就能完成了。

sentences.en: We shall see that this is not entirely true.
sentences.cn: 我们会明白这并非全是真的。

sentences.en: Well, shall we go?
sentences.cn: 那，我们走好吗？

trans.tran_cn: 将要，将会，必须，一定，应该，可以，能够

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something will definitely happen, or that you are determined that something should happen
You use shall with "I" and "we" in questions in order to make offers or suggestions, or to ask for advice
used to say what you will do in the future
